university.name: California State University, Fresno
university.description: California State University, Fresno is a public university in Fresno, California. It is one of 23 campuses in the California State University system.

organizations.name: Active Minds Club
organizations.description: Connects students to mental health resources they may not know they needed or did not know were available.

organizations.name: African American Student Social Work Association
organizations.description: Provides collaboration with community reps and professionals, mentorship, leadership development, and peer connection.

organizations.name: Africana Studies Student Association Club
organizations.description: Encourages conversation around the African Diaspora and provides a safe space to learn about Africana Studies.

organizations.name: Ag Business Club / National Agri-Marketing Association Chapter
organizations.description: Connects students with both academic and industry opportunities through activities, networking, and support systems.

organizations.name: American Heart Association Student Chapter
organizations.description: Raises awareness of heart health and cardiovascular diseases through events and volunteer opportunities.

organizations.name: American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics
organizations.description: Provides education and projects in aerospace engineering; students compete in aircraft/rocket design competitions.

organizations.name: American Sign Language Club
organizations.description: Focuses on learning and communicating in ASL, open to all majors, not just Deaf Education or Interpreting students.

organizations.name: Anime Association Club
organizations.description: Promotes appreciation of Japanese animation and culture through events and activities.

organizations.name: Asian Social Work Organization
organizations.description: A group for undergraduate and graduate social work students to promote networking and involvement.

organizations.name: Art of Life Cancer Foundation Club
organizations.description: Provides support and programs for cancer survivors and those impacted by cancer.

organizations.name: Association for Computing Machinery (ACM)
organizations.description: Connects computer science and tech students through events, competitions, and projects.

organizations.name: Association of Pre-Pharmacy Students
organizations.description: Supports students interested in pursuing pharmacy through resources, panels, and school prep.

organizations.name: Black Student Union
organizations.description: Creates a space for Black students to connect, support each other, and foster cultural awareness.

organizations.name: Bulldog Racing Club
organizations.description: Designs and builds formula-style race cars for intercollegiate competitions, focused on engineering and teamwork.

organizations.name: Chicano Latino Youth Leadership Project (CLYLP) Fresno State Chapter
organizations.description: Focuses on civic engagement, leadership, and college retention among Latino students.

organizations.name: Club Sports Council
organizations.description: Serves as the student governing body for all recognized club sports at Fresno State.

organizations.name: Cru
organizations.description: A Christian student organization focused on faith, community, and leadership development.

organizations.name: Delta Alpha Pi International Honor Society
organizations.description: Recognizes academic achievement of students with disabilities and promotes inclusive excellence.

organizations.name: Dog Days Orientation Leaders
organizations.description: Supports incoming students through peer mentorship and orientation programs.

organizations.name: Feminist Majority Leadership Alliance
organizations.description: Aims to promote gender equality, activism, and dialogue around feminist issues.
